mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.trade_id AS "tradeId", a.trade_type AS "tradeType", a.trade_direction AS "tradeDirection", a.trade_mode AS "tradeMode", a.trade_amount AS "tradeAmount", a.trade_time AS "tradeTime", a.payee_name AS "payeeName", a.payee_type AS "payeeType", a.trade_status AS "tradeStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", case when a.trade_type=1 then ta.agreement_name when a.trade_type=3 or a.trade_type=7 or a.trade_type=6 or a.trade_type=8 then tc.contract_name or a.trade_type=11 else "" end tradeName, case when a.trade_type=1 then ta.agreement_status when a.trade_type=3 or a.trade_type=7 or a.trade_type=6 or a.trade_type=8 then tc.contract_status else "" end transStatus, tc.contract_busi_status as transBusiStatus
left join t_deposit_agreement ta on a.trade_id=ta.id left join t_rent_contract tc on a.trade_id=tc.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_trading_accounts( id, trade_id, trade_type, trade_direction, trade_mode, trade_amount, trade_time, payee_name, payee_type, trade_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tradeId}, #{tradeType}, #{tradeDirection}, #{tradeMode}, #{tradeAmount}, #{tradeTime}, #{payeeName}, #{payeeType}, #{tradeStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_trading_accounts SET trade_id = #{tradeId}, trade_type = #{tradeType}, trade_direction = #{tradeDirection}, trade_mode = #{tradeMode}, trade_amount = #{tradeAmount}, trade_time = #{tradeTime}, payee_name = #{payeeName}, payee_type = #{payeeType}, trade_status = #{tradeStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
